Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ClientTUI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ClientTUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientSkeleton, Serializable, Remote
public class ClientTUI extends Client
The ClientTUI class represents a text-based user interface for the client.
See Also:

    • openChat

      public void openChat()
      Opens the chat interface. Sets the client phase to "CHAT" and starts a new thread for the chat.

    • closeChat

      public void closeChat()
      Closes the chat interface. Sets the client phase back to "GAME" and stops the chat thread.
